title: Dune: Part Two
description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen while facing the forces that threaten Arrakis.

title: Oppenheimer
description: The story of J. Robert Oppenheimer and the creation of the atomic bomb.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Miles Morales becomes Spider-Man and meets other Spider-people across the multiverse.

title: John Wick
description: A retired hitman seeks vengeance after losing what he loved most.
